title: Mobile Learning-Based Professional Mathematics Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced mathematics and practical experience in the field
context.additional_context: Optimizing mathematics learning using mobile devices for professionals in medical/legal/technical fields

learning_goals: Development of a plan to utilize at least three types of math learning materials accessible in mobile environments

The learner visualizes three real-life context-based math problems (e.g., household budgeting, investment planning) using a concept-mapping tool (MindMeister, etc.), and explains the problem-solving process in five distinct stages.
Evaluation and mastery of the ability to reconstruct math problems considering interconnections between learning contexts
Design of personalized math learning solutions based on analysis of individual learning patterns
Development of math problem-solving processes using real-time collaboration tools
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
